title: Optus Cable
body:
Hey guys! I recently moved houses and was able to get cable and couldnt beleive the speed increase that was promised!!! Anyways i have found that with league i get huge spikes to around 800-1000 up from the low 20's. Is this a common problem with Optus Cable and LoL? If so i might change back to ADSL to which i never got these huge spikes.
Cheers Sinyxx
